short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy code snippets from your favorite sites, on one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy code snippets from your favorite sites, on one click. 
 English (US) 	
This extensions allows you to copy code snippets on supported sites, with just a click.

Sites currently supported:

stackoverflow.com,
developer.mozilla.org,
github.com,
w3schools.com,
askubuntu.com,
stackexchange.com,
css-tricks.com
